UPI Dorong Pemberdayaan Yang Dilakukan Raja Galuh Pakuan Masuk Dalam Kurtilas Mulok Pendidikan
06 Nov 2019, 18:35 by Ruslan Efendi


UPI Dorong Pemberdayaan Yang Dilakukan Raja Galuh Pakuan Masuk Dalam Kurtilas Mulok Pendidikan

KBRN, Subang : Ketua Departemen Pendidikan Musik FPSD Universitas Pendidikan Indonesia (UPI) Bandung Dr. Uus Karwati M.Sn menilai, eksistensi pemberdayaan yang dilakukan Raja Lembaga Adat Karatwan (LAK) Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, layak masuk kurikulum 13 (Kurtilas) Muatan Lokal (Mulok) Pendidikan.
Karena menurut Dr. Uus, LAK Galuh Pakuan merupakan sebuah lembaga bahkan sebagai sebuah wahana pemberdayaan masyarakat.
"Kenapa sebuah lembaga, karena ini terkoordinasi dengan baik, dan terstruktur dengan baik, apa itu sebuah wahana ?, karena Galuh Pakuan ini terbuka untuk segala kegiatan, yang tertumpu pada pemberdayaan masyarakat, atas dasar itulah LAK Galuh Pakuan pantas masuk kurtilas mulok pendidikan," ujar Dr. Uus kepada wartawan saat berkunjung ke Karatwan Galuh Pakuan di Subang, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Uus menjelaskan, alasan dirinya mengusulkan LAK Galuh Pakuan masuk dalam kurtilas mulok pendidikan, karena semua pemberdayaan yang sudah dilakukan Raja LAK Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati, mulai dari bidang pendidikan, kebudayaan, kemudian bidang budi pekerti, sosial, pertanian dan yang lain-lainnya, untuk menperkokoh dan memperkuat jati diri budaya sunda. Maka akan lebih baik lagi diperkenalkan sejak dini kepada anak-anak melalui pendidik formal.
"Saya dengar sendiri dari Raja, tentang semua pemberdayaan masyarakat yang sudah dilakukan LAK Galuh Pakuan kepada masyarakatnya, dan saya membidik satu sisi yaitu dalam bidang pemberdayaan seni dan budaya, yang harus menjadi sebuah pemikiran kita di UPI, bagaimana bisa masuk dalam kurtilas mulok pendidikan," katanya.
Dari tumpuan itulah kata Uus, agar anak-anak didik memiliki pemikiran yang luas, dan dapat mengenal jati diri, sehingga karakter kesundaannya muncul.
"Jati diri dari budaya itulah akan muncul karakter kesundaan, saya harap, Dinas Pendidikan dan Kebudayaan dan pemerintah, bisa mengadopsinya sebagai mulok dalam kurtilas pemdidikan," terang Uus.
Masukan ini dikatakanya, demi kemajuan dunia pendidikan di Kabupaten Subang khususnya, agar generasi muda Subang memiliki karakter.
"Ya mudah-mudahan saja, apa yang dilakukan LAK Galuh Pakuan, dapat menerapkan karakter kesundaannya," pungkasnya.

UPI Encourages Empowerment by Raja Galuh Pakuan to Enter into Kurtilas Mulok Education
Nov 6, 2019, 18:35 by Ruslan Efendi


UPI Encourages Empowerment by Raja Galuh Pakuan to Enter into Kurtilas Mulok Education

KBRN, Subang: Chair of the Department of Music Education FPSD Indonesian Education University (UPI) Bandung Dr. Uus Karwati M.Sn assessed that the existence of the empowerment carried out by the King of Karatwan Customary Institution (LAK) Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati Evi Silviadi, deserves the 13th curriculum (Kurtilas) Local Content (Mulok) Education.
Because according to Dr. Uus, LAK Galuh Pakuan is an institution even as a vehicle for community empowerment.
"Why is an institution, because it is well coordinated, and well structured, is that a vehicle? Because Galuh Pakuan is open to all activities, which are based on community empowerment, based on that, LAK Galuh Pakuan deserves to enter the curriculum of education," said Dr. Uus told reporters during a visit to Karatwan Galuh Pakuan in Subang, Wednesday (11/06/2019).
Uus explained, the reason he proposed LAK Galuh Pakuan was included in the education curb at Mulok, because all the empowerments that had been carried out by King LAK Galuh Pakuan Rahyang Mandalajati, starting from the fields of education, culture, then the fields of character, social, agriculture and others, were for strengthen and strengthen the identity of Sundanese culture. So it would be better to be introduced early on to children through formal educators.
"I heard myself from Raja, about all the community empowerments that have been carried out by LAK Galuh Pakuan to his community, and I aimed at one side, namely in the field of arts and culture empowerment, which should be a thought of us at UPI, how to be included in the curriculum of Mulok Education, "he said.
From that foundation, said Uus, so students have broad thinking, and can get to know their identity, so that the character of their delay appears.
"Identity from culture will show the character of delay, I hope, the Office of Education and Culture and the government, can adopt it as a mulok in education kurtilas," explained Uus.
This input is said, for the sake of advancement in the world of education in Subang Regency in particular, so that the younger generation of Subang has character.
"Yes, hopefully, what LAK Galuh Pakuan has done can apply the character of his delay," he concluded.
